thread.title: Gear review: Chaco Women’s OutCross Evo 1
thread.title_full: Gear review: Chaco Women’s OutCross Evo 1 - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jill K. Robinson
title: Gear review: Chaco Women’s OutCross Evo 1
text:
Photo: Chaco 8359166|article-6414046|7 8359166|article-6414046|1 email_share_embed|photo-8359166|article-6414046|1 8359166|article-6414046|2 8359166|article-6414046|3 8359166|article-6414046|4 8359166|article-6414046|5 google_share_embed|photo-8359166|article-6414046|6 Chaco Women's Outcross Evo 1 Chaco Women's Outcross Evo 1
Packing multiple pairs of shoes for different vacation excursions can really suck up suitcase space. For lightening the load, it’s best to find a shoe with many talents — like the Chaco OutCross Evo 1. The breathable mesh and webbing upper plus the protective toe bumper keeps the shoes securely on your feet (and your toes safe) when you’re in the water. But the addition of a rugged outsole that’s solid enough for hiking once you’re on land means less slipping and sliding. Chaco’s comfortable Luvseat footbed means you’re not kicking these shoes off the second your adventures are over. Chaco Women's Outcross Evo 1 Chaco Women's Outcross Evo 1
Packing multiple pairs of shoes for different vacation excursions can really suck up suitcase space. For lightening the load, it’s best to find a shoe with many talents — like the Chaco OutCross Evo 1. The breathable mesh and webbing upper plus the protective toe bumper keeps the shoes securely on your feet (and your toes safe) when you’re in the water. But the addition of a rugged outsole that’s solid enough for hiking once you’re on land means less slipping and sliding. Chaco’s comfortable Luvseat footbed means you’re not kicking these shoes off the second your adventures are over.
